BETTER PACKAGING
Optimizing our packaging helps us address 
an even bigger issue—food waste. According 
to Quantis, a sustainability and lifecycle 
assessment firm, food waste has an adverse 
environmental impact 10 times greater than 
packaging. We are mindful of our responsibility 
to prevent food waste by protecting our 
products and pursue a multi-faceted approach 
to sustainability to avoid unintended 
consequences on the climate that may arise 
from focusing solely on packaging. Reducing 
food waste also reduces our environmental 
impact from the production of raw materials, 
since it reduces the amount of raw materials  
we need.
